name: orca-page-display-plugin
description: Orca 页面显示插件 - 支持页面空间显示、图标切换、多行多列显示等功能

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && git push origin --tags
